title: Sunrise
description: Erin Hunter's #1 nationally bestselling Warriors series continues with the sixth book  in the Power of Three series! The final book in this third series, Warriors: Power of Three #6: Sunrise , brings more adventure, intrigue, and thrilling battles to the epic world of the warrior Clans. The secret of Hollyleaf's, Jayfeather's, and Lionblaze's true identities has been revealed, but one shocking question remains unanswered. Now Clanmate will turn upon Clanmate, and one more warrior may be lost forever….
author: Erin Hunter
